question: Which quarter shows the best overall store performance based on the stacked bar chart?

options.A: Q3 shows the best performance with the highest total value.
options.B: Q2 shows the best performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance precisely because it combines unrelated business metrics.
options.D: Q1 shows the best performance with the lowest electricity consumption.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated business metrics (store visits, electricity consumption, customer comments) into a single total. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
